TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
1 hour ago, ColdJ said:

How many AI does it take to screw in a lightbulb?

None. AI doesn't have any hands. AI can only write a pleasant and positive paragraph about how to do it.

Why doesn't Siri or Alexa have a last name?

That's their full names (Si Ri and Al Exa)

Are you a bot?

Not am bot.

Bot about U?

No bots about it.

Are we broadcasting in to space, a "how to" on invading the Earth?

Yes, and that's the actual reasons of the aliens' silence.
They prefer to stay as far as possible.

How do they distinguish the bikers on bikes from th bikers on bikes?

By calling them Tricyclists.

What would a peaceful world look like?

All good people have killed all bad people.

Why are the Pyramids made of useless stones rather than ice?

Because everybody kept stealing the ice. (It is a girls best friend)

Were the ancient pyramids a scheme?

No scheme. Illegal aliens have built it from local junk, using Minecraft as a CAD.

What if fill a pyramid with oil, and then light it?

You will be able to see it at night.

Where is my hydrogen filled personal airship?

Still lifting.

What if fill a bathyscaphe with hydrogen?

It becomes Bathysphaera intacta

why does the world inconvenience me so much?

040508012024

A metal balloon.

What likes bridges and money?

A bridge player in breeches from Brugge.

If the trolls live underbridge, does it mean that bridge building is prohibited by the forum rules?

You may build the bridge, but trolls burning bridges behind them is a no no.

Can the tinder app start a fire?

No, because people created it for love.

When you love food, does food love you?

No. Getting disolved in stomach acid tends to dampen the mood.

How big around would the base of the giant beanstalk have to be?

10 Meters.

How to eat?

Slowly.

Is accountant account accounted?

Edited Saturday at 05:40 AM by kerbiloid

Yes, there is an account of an accounted accountant, accounting for a count.

Did I miss anything?

Miss Anything is actually Mrs. Anything.

Who was Ana, after whom Anakin was named?

They were the kin of the tribe Ana, whose leader was Sav Ana.

Where is the unknown island?

Where the unknown is land.

Are the Bermudes the home of Kraken?

The Kraken has no home, it prefers to roam.

Does Kraken taste like Kerbal?

No, but the Kerbals like the taste of Kraken.

Is Kraken better boiled or fried?
